alert.note: Alert for Barry; Christian; Greene; Lawrence; Newton; Stone (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 15 at 10:55AM CDT until May 15 at 12:00PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Newton County in southwestern Missouri... Northwestern Christian County in southwestern Missouri... Northern Stone County in southwestern Missouri... Northern Barry County in southwestern Missouri... Lawrence County in southwestern Missouri... Southwestern Greene County in southwestern Missouri... * Until noon CDT. * At 1055 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Everton to 7 miles west of Mount Vernon to near Carthage, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Republic... Table Rock Lake... Monett... Aurora... Battlefield... Mount Vernon... Marionville... Clever... Crane... Pierce City... Purdy... Billings... Wheaton... Verona... Butterfield... Galena... Fairview... Mccord Bend... Newtonia... Pioneer... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 39 and 65, and near mile marker 69. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Barry; Christian; Greene; Lawrence; Newton; Stone
